amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $500,000 from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service to the National Park Service for restoring the Susan B. Anthony House in Rochester, NY.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $500,000 from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service to the National Park Service for restoring the Susan B. Anthony house.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 351 (Roll no. 261).
